name: Mystery Coast: Treasure Hunt
description:
Dive the shipwrecks of the Mystery Coast with Storm and the crew of the Mary Rose, to uncover secrets ancient and new. Restore and auction the world's greatest lost treasures from your workshop, as you uncover the biggest mystery of all: Storm's past.

Are you ready for your mission?

MAGICAL MYSTERIES
Travel the Mystery Coast with Storm and her crew. Find and restore priceless treasures at each new shipwreck on your way to the ultimate prize.

RESTORE & CLEAN
Hundreds of ancient artefacts to uncover and clean, before selling at auction.
 
DAILY MISSIONS
Earn points and Gems with daily missions from mysterious clients all over the world.
